channel.title: Tips
channel.description: well, im not exactly new to web design, but i kinda havent done it in a while and, although i remember html, i dont remember php, css, or js. so i was wondering if anyone had any good tutorials on learning them or something. i just need to re learn them so i can be more active in this section. also, im learning visual basic but my mom is helping me with that cuz she has to take a class on it for her masters in something, so maybe some help there too.

item.title: Tips
item.dc:creator: @robocz033 robocz033
item.description:
@robocz033 wrote:

alright, thanks 3.65 kilos, ill read my book and check w3schools.com

item.title: Tips
item.dc:creator: @TestDummy TestDummy
item.description:
@TestDummy wrote:

What can I say, I’m bored.

I’d be less of one if the OP would just answer the question I asked and link to a few of the marginal tutorials he keeps having so much trouble following.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @3.65_kilos 3.65 kilos
item.description:
@3.65_kilos wrote:

TestDummy…you’re a douche.

robocz, I like w3schools.com. But when I learned PHP, I checked out a book from my local library.

item.title: Tips
item.dc:creator: @robocz033 robocz033
item.description:
@robocz033 wrote:

ok, ive search google, and looked at a few tuts for php, but none explain it that good for me. so just w/e. ill read my book i bought on it. [sarcasm] youve been a real help, thanks. [/sarcasm]

item.title: Tips
item.dc:creator: @TestDummy TestDummy
item.description:
@TestDummy wrote:

What’s “it”? The language?

You don’t seem to be very clear as to what you mean, as I said.
Are the tutorials you’re using just not being clear period? Which ones are you talking about, anyways?

Read full topic

item.title: Tips
item.dc:creator: @robocz033 robocz033
item.description:
@robocz033 wrote:

ive been raised tought that there was no such thing as a stupid question. and the tuts i found dont explain it that well.

Read full topic

item.title: Tips
item.dc:creator: @TestDummy TestDummy
item.description:
@TestDummy wrote:

Most tutorials I can find for any given language at least gloss over all the basic syntax, semantics and functions.
“Good” seems to be a subjective analysis, is something missing from the tutorials you’ve found so far that you’re looking for?

I don’t typically mean to come across as a dick, but I was raised in the school of thought where stupid questions deserved stupid answers.

Read full topic

item.title: Tips
item.dc:creator: @robocz033 robocz033
item.description:
@robocz033 wrote:

yea, im not really sure why she has to take a VB class because for what she is going to do it makes no sense.

As for the tutorials, did search google, but found no good tutorials, so im asking here. why are you being a dick about it? i just wanted some advice from people who may have tutorials for php and stuff. duh. people like you piss me off.

Read full topic

item.title: Tips
item.dc:creator: @TestDummy TestDummy
item.description:
@TestDummy wrote:

I mainly meant the part about the masters and VB.

Tutorials can be found using Google. You people do remember how to use search engines, right?

Here’s a hint: Take any given thing you want to learn about and try putting the word “tutorial” in front of it.
If you don’t get at least a million results back, you’ve failed.

Read full topic

item.title: Tips
item.dc:creator: @robocz033 robocz033
item.description:
@robocz033 wrote:

idk…maybe cuz its my mom teaching me? shes getting her masters in something to do with nursing…is there a problem with that?

Read full topic
